marklogic.body: Wow, Andrea!  I found these unsent letters through Budgeting in the Fun Stuff, and they made me laugh my ass Off.  But it was that kind of "ha-ha so I don't boo-hoo" laugh you get when you recognize the truth in sucktitude.  I hope you work it all out with the job and I'll share with you my two favorite curses.  My grandmother Betta liked to say "May s/he get what s/he deserves," which I like because it doesn't f**k with my karma.  And my grandmother Ruthie liked to say "May s/he get Bleeding hemorrhoids!" which I like because it's vicious.  I hope they work for you.

target.displayName: Unsent Letters: I\'m Over My Job (Again) Edition
